main.translators: Launchpad Contributions: OpenIntents devs https://launchpad.net/~openintents-devs Sjoerd Hiemstra https://launchpad.net/~sjohie

description.string: OI About is a standalone about dialog that is shared between apps.
This application is invoked through the menu of other OI applications.
It allows you to view version information, links, credits, and license of an application.
Credits include authors, documentation, translators, and artists.
All of this functionality is brought together in a simplistic and efficient layout.
Deze applicatie is advertentievrij, en heeft geen internet toegang nodig.
De broncode van deze gratis en open source applicatie is beschikbaar op:
Het complete overzicht van wijzigingen en de FAQ is te lezen op:
Jij kan helpen om de vertaling in je eigen taal te verbeteren via Launchpad:
Eigenschappen:
description.listitem: Shows general info, credits, and license tabs.
Shows translators of all language versions.
Retrieves information from application manifest through default tags and metadata.
Optionally, all fields can be modified through intent extras.
description.string: Applications that work with "OI About":
description.listitem: OI Notepad
OI File manager
OI Shopping List
OI Convert CSV
OI Safe
OI Countdown
OI Flashlight
description.string: Sleutelwoorden:
description.listitem: About, Credits, Information.
OI, OpenIntents, Open Intents.
description.string: Internationale versies

OI File Manager biedt de mogelijkheid om de inhoud van de SD kaart te doorzoeken, directory\'s aan te maken, en bestanden te hernoemen, kopiÃ«ren, verplaatsen en te verwijderen.
Wordt als extensie gebuikt door andere programma\'s, om de dialoogboxen "open" en "save" te tonen,
Deze applicatie is advertentievrij, en heeft geen internet toegang nodig.
Het complete overzicht van wijzigingen en de FAQ is te lezen op:
Jij kan helpen om de vertaling in je eigen taal te verbeteren via Launchpad:
De broncode van deze gratis en open source applicatie is beschikbaar op:
Eigenschappen:
description.listitem: Toon een lijst van bestanden met thumbnails voor foto\'s.
Verplaats, kopieer, hernoem en verwijder bestanden.
Maak en verwijder directories
Verstuur bestanden via email
Wordt als extensie gebuikt door andere programma\'s zoals GMail, om bestanden toe te kunnen voegen.
Ondersteunt vele bestandsformaten en mime types.
Ondersteunt PICK_FILE en PICK_DIRECTORY intents, waardoor andere programma\'s OI File Manager ook kunnen gebruiken.

Search strings for Market:
OI Flashlight is a simple and effective application that helps you find a way in the dark.
OI Flashlight locks the display backlight on, clearly illuminating the surrounding area.
For devices with a camera flash, OI Flashlight can also use the flash as a bright torch to brighten the room.
The color of the backlight is completely customizable with OI Color Picker.
Deze applicatie is advertentievrij, en heeft geen internet toegang nodig.
De broncode van deze gratis en open source applicatie is beschikbaar op:
Het complete overzicht van wijzigingen en de FAQ is te lezen op:
Jij kan helpen om de vertaling in je eigen taal te verbeteren via Launchpad:
Eigenschappen:
description.listitem: Lock the display backlight on.
Lock camera flash on.
The color of backlight is customizable.
description.string: Available extensions for "OI Flashlight":
description.listitem: Show the license information with "OI About".
Change the color of the backlight with "OI Color Picker".
description.string: Applications that work with "OI Flashlight":
description.listitem: Update with "OI Update".

OI, OpenIntents, Open Intents

Search strings for Market:
OI Notepad is a full-featured open source note taking application.
With it you can tag, search, and send your notes, in addition to basic functionality such as creating, deleting, and editing notes.
Advanced features like encryption, import/export, and voice memos are all available through extensions.
All of this functionality is brought together in a simplistic and efficient layout, customizable through a variety of themes.
Deze applicatie is advertentievrij, en heeft geen internet toegang nodig.
De broncode van deze gratis en open source applicatie is beschikbaar op:
Het complete overzicht van wijzigingen en de FAQ is te lezen op:
Jij kan helpen om de vertaling in je eigen taal te verbeteren via Launchpad:
Eigenschappen:
description.listitem: Add, edit and delete notes.
Long-press on notes to add tags.
Change font size and sort order.
A clearly arranged layout with a variety of themes.
Quickly search through notes.
Send notes as MMS or SMS.
description.string: Available extensions for "OI Notepad":
description.listitem: Record and attach voice memos to notes with "OI Voice Notes".
With "OI Convert CSV" import/export notes from the SD card.
Show the license information with "OI About".
Insert the date and time into notes with "OI Insert Date".
Turn text upside down with "Upside Down".
description.string: Applications that work with "OI Notepad":
description.listitem: Back up notes with "My Backup Pro".
Encrypt notes using "OI Safe".
Manage notes on your SD Card with "OI File Manager".
Update with "OI Update".
Share notes through "Facebook", "Gmail", "Google+", "Twitter", and many other applications.
description.string: Sleutelwoorden:
description.listitem: Note, Notepad, Note book, Notes
OI, OpenIntents, Open Intents
description.string: Internationale versies
Search strings for Market:
OI Shopping List is a powerful application which makes it easy to create and manage checklists.
OI Shopping List makes it easy to add items to a list, check the item off, and remove it from the list.
The application can track separate prices for each store that you use, and features a high level of customization.
Font size, sort order, list columns, and list cleanup behavior are all settings controlled by the user.
All of these features are brought together in a crisp layout that is customizable through a variety of themes.
De broncode van deze gratis en open source applicatie is beschikbaar op:
Deze applicatie is advertentievrij, en heeft geen internet toegang nodig.
Het complete overzicht van wijzigingen en de FAQ is te lezen op:
Jij kan helpen om de vertaling in je eigen taal te verbeteren via Launchpad:
Eigenschappen:
description.listitem: Add, edit and delete lists.
Create, delete, and check items quickly and easily.
Variety of themes.
Customizable font size and sort order.
Keep track of separate prices for each store.
Customizable list columns.
description.string: Available extensions for "OI Shopping List":
description.listitem: Add a recorded message to a note with "OI Voice Notes".
Import/export shopping lists with "OI Convert CSV".
Show the license information with "OI About".
Enter/check items with "Barcode OI Plugin".
description.string: Applications that work with "OI Shopping List":
description.listitem: Update with "OI Update".
Backup lists with "My Backup Pro".
Import ingredients of recipes with "Bites".
